user_specduty.js.name: SpecDuty
user_specduty.js.longDesc: Show explorers/geologists task info with estimated and arrival time. With slide switch you can change specialist type
user_specduty.js.author: SirriS

user_guild.js.name: Guild
user_guild.js.longDesc: Show simple guild info with quest and player status
user_guild.js.author: MkFera

user_generals.js.name: Generals
user_generals.js.longDesc: Show info about your generals like army, status and more. Can send to star menu or adventure. Support templates.
user_generals.js.author: MkFera

user_collectables.js.name: Collectables
user_collectables.js.longDesc: Find and select collectibles on main island or adventure
user_collectables.js.author: MkFera

user_friends.js.name: Friends
user_friends.js.longDesc: Show info about your friends and guild members
user_friends.js.author: MkFera&SirriS

user_buildlist.js.name: Building List and Monitoring
user_buildlist.js.shortDesc: List of buildings ans monitoring updates
user_buildlist.js.longDesc: list of buildings with the possibility to select and keep under observation some buildings that are being updated
user_buildlist.js.author: MkFera

user_spechide.js.name: HideSpec
user_spechide.js.longDesc: Simply hididing generals, geologists or explorers from StarMenu
user_spechide.js.author: SirriS

user_showmyloot.js.name: Show My Loot
user_showmyloot.js.longDesc: Upload adventure loot info to service Show My Loot on tsomaps.com
user_showmyloot.js.author: SirriS
